channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-12609] Remove javaXML serialization
item.description: We use kryo as default serializer and javaXML based serialization is not used in many places and is also not well tested. We should remove javaXML serialization and make kryo as the only serialization option.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: I will start this after HIVE-12302
Ashutosh Chauhan/Sergey Shelukhin Can someone please review this patch?
its better to target this for 2.0 since in general you want to keep 2.1 compatible as much as possible with 2.0

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12776438/HIVE-12609.1.patch

selectDistinctStar.q is unrelated to this patch. I tested it even without this patch it still produces diff. Filed HIVE-12657 for it. Other test failures are unrelated.
Committed to master and cherrypicked to branch-2.0

Doc note: This removes hive.plan.serialization.format from HiveConf.java in 2.0.0, so the wiki needs to be updated.

  • Configuration Properties – hive.plan.serialization.format
